Edvard Grieg

Pictures from Folk-Life (Humoresques), op. 19

1869–1871

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 16' 30"

  • 1. In the Mountains
  • 2. Bridal Procession
  • 3. From the Carnival

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/2 · Andre originalkomposisjoner · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Könemann · K 267 · Sonata and Piano Pieces · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100b · Piano Works / II / Original Works

1. In the Mountains

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Bridal Procession

Grieg later arranged this piece for piano duet.

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
